Structs/FeatureRequest.html.name: FeatureRequest
Structs/FeatureRequest.html.abstract: A view modifier for requesting a feature.

Structs.html#/s:13CausalLabsSDK12Require.name: RequiredOnce
Structs.html#/s:13CausalLabsSDK12Require.abstract: A property wrapper that requires a value to be set once.

Protocols/SessionProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.name: updateFrom(json:)
Protocols/SessionProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.abstract: Updates the session using the specified JSON.

Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.name: isActive
Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.abstract: Whether or not this feature is active.

Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.name: impressionIds
Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.abstract: The impression ids associated with this feature.

Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.name: updateFrom(json:)
Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.abstract: Updates the feature using the specified JSON.

Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.name: copy(newImpressionId:)
Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html#/s:13Caus.abstract: Returns a copy of this feature with newImpressionId.

Protocols/EventProtocol.html#/s:13Causal.name: featureName
Protocols/EventProtocol.html#/s:13Causal.abstract: The name of the feature for which this event is associated.

Protocols/EventProtocol.html.name: EventProtocol
Protocols/EventProtocol.html.abstract: Describes an event generated from the Causal SDK.

Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html.name: FeatureProtocol
Protocols/FeatureProtocol.html.abstract: Describes a feature generated from the Causal SDK.

Protocols/FeatureViewModel.html.name: FeatureViewModel
Protocols/FeatureViewModel.html.abstract: Describes a view model for a feature

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP13.name: requestFeature(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP13.abstract: Requests the specified feature exactly once from the Causal API.

Enums/DebugLogVerbosity.html#/s:13Causal.name: verbose
Enums/DebugLogVerbosity.html#/s:13Causal.abstract: Enables all logging. Logs include info messages, warnings, and errors.

Enums/CausalError.html#/s:13CausalLabsSD.name: json(json:error:)
Enums/CausalError.html#/s:13CausalLabsSD.abstract: Indicates an error occurred when encoding, decoding, or processing json.

Enums/CausalError.html#/s:13CausalLabsSD.name: networkResponse(request:response:error:)
Enums/CausalError.html#/s:13CausalLabsSD.abstract: Indicates an error occurred with the server response.

Enums/CausalError.html.name: CausalError
Enums/CausalError.html.abstract: Describes possible errors thrown by the Causal SDK.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: configuration
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: A configuration object that defines behavior and policies for a URL session.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: requestFeatures(features:impressionId:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: Requests a set of features to be updated from the impression server.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: requestCacheFill(features:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: Requests a set of features that will be cached for later use.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: signalAndWait(event:impressionId:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: Signals that the specified event occurred for an impression.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: keepAlive()
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: Instructs the server to keep the session alive.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: updateFeatures(_:impressionId:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: An alternative to requestFeatures() that is non-throwing and updates features in-place.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: requestFeature(feature:impressionId:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: Requests a single feature to be updated from the impression server.

Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.name: signalEvent(_:impressionId:)
Classes/CausalClient.html#/s:13CausalLab.abstract: An alternative to signalAndWait() that is “fire-and-forget” and ignores errors.

Classes/CausalClient.html.name: CausalClient
Classes/CausalClient.html.abstract: The main entry point to the Causal iOS SDK.
